Description: You survived on a prayer and 5% health while taking down 3 enemies. Peak yordle energy.
Technical Logic (Riot Match-V5): onKill where victim.kill occurs while player.current_hp / player.max_hp < 0.05.

Description: You dealt the most damage on your team despite having the lowest total health pool.
Technical Logic (Riot Match-V5): Final stats: totalDamageDealt == max(team) AND max_hp == min(team).

Description: You had the highest Vision Score and most Assists on your team. You run this town.
Technical Logic (Riot Match-V5): Final stats: visionScore == max(team) AND assists == max(team).

Description: One Pentakill is a fluke; two in one game is a war crime. Welcome to the high command.
Technical Logic (Riot Match-V5): multikill >= 5 count in metadata. Trigger if count == 2.

Description: You secured 3+ kills while being outnumbered (1v2 or 1v3) in the immediate area.
Technical Logic (Riot Match-V5): onKill where enemy_count_in_1000_range > ally_count_in_1000_range. Trigger on count >= 3.

Description: You participated in every single turret destruction on the map. The empire's borders only move forward.
Technical Logic (Riot Match-V5): turret_kill_participation (killer or assist) count matches total_enemy_turrets_destroyed.

Description: You were present for every single Epic Monster kill. A true vanguard never misses an objective.
Technical Logic (Riot Match-V5): participation_rate on elite_monster_kills (Dragon/Baron/Herald) == 1.0.

Description: You mitigated 50,000+ damage during the match. They broke their swords against your resolve.
Technical Logic (Riot Match-V5): Final stats check: damageSelfMitigated + totalDamageTaken >= 50,000.

Description: You were the first person to deal damage in 5 separate teamfight kills. You lead the charge.
Technical Logic (Riot Match-V5): For onKill events, check damage_log. Trigger if player has the earliest timestamp of all assisters.

Description: You finished with the highest gold count in the lobby. Everyone else is just a stowaway.
Technical Logic (Riot Match-V5): Final stats check: totalGoldEarned == max(all_10_players_gold).

Description: You stole Baron while your entire team was dead. High stakes, higher reward.
Technical Logic (Riot Match-V5): elite_monster_kill by player while team_alive_count == 1.

Description: You reached 4,000 gold by the 10:00 mark. You’ve got a nose for the "shiny" stuff.
Technical Logic (Riot Match-V5): Query timeline.frames[10]. Sum totalGold (passive + active income) >= 4000.

Description: You won after being down 10,000 gold. The ice doesn't break, and neither do you.
Technical Logic (Riot Match-V5): Timeline check: enemy_team_gold - team_gold >= 10000 at any frame + win == true.

Description: 100+ CC score and 15+ assists. You turned the enemy team into living statues.
Technical Logic (Riot Match-V5): Final stats check: timeCCingOthers >= 100 AND assists >= 15.

Description: You mitigated 10,000 damage in a single 20-second fight. You are the mountain.
Technical Logic (Riot Match-V5): Sum damageSelfMitigated within a sliding 20000ms window. Trigger if >= 10,000.

Description: 100% Kill Participation. You were the heartbeat of every single fight on the map.
Technical Logic (Riot Match-V5): Final Stats: (kills + assists) / team_total_kills == 1.0.

Description: You hit all 5 enemies with a single Ultimate. A perfect symphony of destruction.
Technical Logic (Riot Match-V5): onAbilityHit where spell_slot == R and unique_targets_hit == 5.

Description: You secured 3 kills in a row where each kill was dealt by a different ability.
Technical Logic (Riot Match-V5): Track killing_blow_source. Trigger if kill_1, kill_2, and kill_3 use 3 unique spell_ids.

Description: 0 deaths and 10+ CS per minute. Efficiency that would make Camille blush.
Technical Logic (Riot Match-V5): deaths == 0 AND (totalMinionsKilled / (gameDuration / 60)) >= 10.0.

Description: You secured a Triple Kill or higher using only your auto-attacks. No mana wasted.
Technical Logic (Riot Match-V5): multikill >= 3 where damage_source_type for all killing blows is BASIC_ATTACK.

Description: You secured a kill from over 2,000 units away. Distance is just another variable.
Technical Logic (Riot Match-V5): onKill where distance(killer_coords, victim_coords) >= 2000.

Description: You pumped out 2,000 damage while below 10% health. High-octane desperation.
Technical Logic (Riot Match-V5): totalDamageDealt within 5s window where player.hp / max_hp < 0.10.

Description: You used 4 different abilities or items to secure 4 kills. Versatility is your only constant.
Technical Logic (Riot Match-V5): Track kill_source_id for last 4 kills. Trigger if all 4 IDs are unique.

Description: You dealt 10,000+ total True Damage or Damage-over-time (Burn/Poison) in one match.
Technical Logic (Riot Match-V5): Final Stats: trueDamageDealtToChampions + totalDamageOverTimeDealt >= 10000.

Description: You denied 10 killing blows on allies. You didn't just support them; you saved their souls.
Technical Logic (Riot Match-V5): damage_event (lethal) negated by player.shield or player.heal count >= 10.

Description: You reached Level 18 before anyone else in the match. The view is better from the top.
Technical Logic (Riot Match-V5): player.level == 18 timestamp is the minimum of all 10 players.

Description: You CC'd all 5 enemies simultaneously using a single ability. A cosmic alignment.
Technical Logic (Riot Match-V5): onAbilityHit where cc_debuff_applied count >= 5 in a single timestamp.

Description: Highest gold, damage, and level. Tell the people what you have seen today.
Technical Logic (Riot Match-V5): gold == max AND damage == max AND level == max across all 10 players.

Description: You destroyed a tower, an inhibitor, and a nexus turret in one continuous push.
Technical Logic (Riot Match-V5): building_kill events for turret, inhibitor, and nexus_turret all by player within 60s.

Description: You took every single jungle camp (including the enemy's) in one rotation. All belongs to Shurima.
Technical Logic (Riot Match-V5): neutral_minion_kill of all 4 buff_camps (Red/Blue both sides) within a 120s window.

Description: You got a Triple Kill while gray-screened. Death is just a change in management.
Technical Logic (Riot Match-V5): multikill >= 3 where killer.isDead == true.

Description: 10+ takedowns inside the enemy base. The mist has finally claimed their home.
Technical Logic (Riot Match-V5): kill.coordinates inside enemy_base_polygon count >= 10.

Description: You healed for 100% of your maximum HP during a single continuous fight.
Technical Logic (Riot Match-V5): totalHealOnSelf within a 15s combat window >= player.max_hp.

Description: You secured a kill within 3 seconds of leaving a bush. They never saw the leaves move.
Technical Logic (Riot Match-V5): onKill where timestamp - last_brush_exit_timestamp < 3000ms.

Description: You killed the enemy Jungler in their own jungle multiple times. Their camps are your camps now.
Technical Logic (Riot Match-V5): onKill on victim.role == JUNGLE inside enemy_jungle_coords count >= 4.

Description: You cleared 15+ wards and secured 2 kills while remaining undetected by the enemy.
Technical Logic (Riot Match-V5): wards_killed >= 15 AND player_visible_to_enemy_count was 0 for 90% of the match.

Description: You shut down an enemy who had a significant gold lead. Adaptation is the key to survival.
Technical Logic (Riot Match-V5): onKill where victim.gold_at_timestamp > player.gold_at_timestamp + 2000.

Description: Over 30% of your damage was True Damage. Resistances are an illusion you’ve deleted.
Technical Logic (Riot Match-V5): Final stats: trueDamageDealtToChampions / totalDamageDealtToChampions >= 0.30.

Description: You secured a kill from your own fountain while the victim was in their base.
Technical Logic (Riot Match-V5): onKill where killer_coords are in Ally_Fountain_Radius AND victim_coords in Enemy_Base_Polygon.
